title: Teacher Emotional Management and Knowledge-Building Strategies in Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Online teaching experience and foundational knowledge of secondary education curriculum design
context.additional_context: In-service math teachers analyze emotions in offline-to-online transitions and strengthen instructional design competencies using knowledge-building approaches

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more key factors influencing teacher emotions (satisfaction, relief, enjoyment) in online educational environments
Learners can suggest two or more emotion-enhancing strategies when designing lessons applying the Knowledge Building Approach (KBA)
Learners can develop one instructional material reflecting peer feedback and reflection through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
